short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Receipts, Invoices and Bills with One Click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop wasting time clicking through billing dashboards and let Receipt Exporter get all the files you need with the click of a button.

Features:
- One button export of all PDFs for the selected dates
- Income/Expense Calculator
- Detailed Summary CSV Export

**NOTE** Receipt Exporter currently only supports Upwork Client and Upwork Freelancer. Please contact support@receiptexporter.com to request a new integration.
